actions.title: [Site Watcher] Fix $NULP price feed — /api/price returning {"price":0,"error":"no pairs found"}
actions.reason: The /api/price endpoint at nullpriest.xyz is returning {"price":0,"error":"no pairs found"}. Nav bar price display shows broken data to every visitor. This breaks the live dashboard aesthetic and makes the site appear inactive. Needs DEX pair diagnosis or fallback display logic.

market_signals.key_finding: Base AI Season ecosystem mapping shows OpenClaw framework dominating agent coordination layer. x402 HTTP payment standard becoming default for agent-to-agent transactions on Base. Multi-agent coordination patterns actively emerging with quorum mechanics gaining traction. Security narrative strengthening — malicious OpenClaw skills targeting crypto wallets documented (Tom's Hardware report). Economic reality filter active — CT calling out agent infrastructure projects with $0 volume. NullPriest's quorum gating + verified collaboration model directly addresses both security and economic proof gaps.
